title: Chicken chasseur with creamy mash
description: This classic French dish is a winner as an easy supper that’s good enough to give to guests. Serve it with a crisp green salad.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
110g/4oz smoked streaky bacon, sliced into lardons
4 tbsp flat leaf parsley, finely chopped
1 kg/2lb 4oz floury potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
